address: No 58 & 60 Jalan Melaka Raya 23, Melaka 75000 Malaysia
description: What about Palsaik Samgyupsal? Palsaik Samgyupsal is a very famous dish in South Korea. In fact, from 2012, nearly all tours to South Korea include a meal of Palsaik, and the majority of these meals are enjoyed in the first Palsaik Samgyupsal restaurant ever, making Palsaik Samgyupsal Seoul’s most visited restaurant, and the country’s most successful chain restaurant. In Korean Palsaik means ‘Eight Colours’. Samgyupsal is the Korean word for pork belly. As such Palsaik Samgyupsal means eight coloured belly pork. The eight colours are provided by the marinades in which the pork belly is flavoured with. At Palsaik, the eight flavours are Ginseng, Wine, Pine Needles, Garlic, Herb, Curry, Miso and Gochujang (Korean Red Pepper Paste). All the colour is naturally-derived, making the pork served at Palsaik 100% natural and free from colouring and any synthetic flavour additives.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: Palsaik Korean BBQ - Melaka Raya

Asam Pedas Rib Eye, Asam Pedas Otak Otak, Asam Pedas Kupang are some of our signature dishes you should not miss. description: Salud means 'cheers' in Spanish and also, 'good health'. Salud Tapas is the newest restaurant in Malacca, where you can try really authentic Spanish food! You have the option to try the famous dishes of Spain, as TAPAS! Tapas, are small bites with big flavours. Salud Tapas, is a casual tapas bar with a fun atmosphere and has an open kitchen where you can see the chef cooking for you. It is a great place to socialise over drinks and exquisite, authentic Spanish tapas. Salud blends modernity with tradition, with authentic food presented with the modern style, and the decor with different spaces-like the long terrace along the Street, to the open kitchen, to the voluminous bar upstairs, the traditional Malaccan centre courtyard, and a chillout area under the stars. Have you ever tried Spanish food? Now, you have the best opportunity to try authentic Spanish food, in the Malacca's heart! So come by to Salud and Salud! Salud Tapas Bar Where Spain comes to Malacca!!

description: Grand Swiss-Belhotel Melaka (Formerly LaCrista Hotel), located in 146, Jalan Hang Tuah, 75300 Melaka. The hotel is conveniently positioned within a short distance from Melaka’s historic district, a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its rich cultural heritage. Visitors staying at the Grand Swiss-Belhotel Melaka can easily explore the fascinating landmarks and attractions of the city’s historical center, including the iconic A Famosa fortress, St. Paul’s Church, Jonker Street, and the Stadthuys. This include a short drive away to the vibrant Dataran Pahlawan Melaka Megamall, a popular shopping complex where tourists can indulge in retail therapy and sample local cuisine at the surrounding eateries. The hotel offers wide variety of food including best halal Dim Sum in Melaka served at Law's Restaurant as well as local and western food at Swiss-Cafe Restaurant. The hotel also offers various meeting packages and event venues.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State

address: 118, Jalan Tun Tan Cheng Lock, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: Hotel Puri Melaka is a boutique hotel in the heart of the old city of Malacca. The hotel is a carefully restored Peranakan house which once belonged to the descendants of an eminent philanthropist and rubber plantation owner, Tan Kim Seng. Extending 100 metres long, its distinct characteristics are its beautiful and intricately decorated façade & the impressive length of the house. Retaining its old charm, Hotel Puri Melaka provides modern amenities to its hotel guests. Our rooms are a tasteful combination of old designs and contemporary touches. Dining options in our Galeri Cafe includes a range of local and international favourites. Wireless internet is available throughout the hotel. Situated within the grounds of the hotel is Puri Spa. We invite you to take a time out, unwind and be pampered in our peaceful environment with tropical water garden, quaint surroundings and inviting private facilities.

Our karaoke bar is perfect venue for singing your hear out and organizing small parties with families and friends. Guests can lounge by the outdoor swimming pool or choose between 2 dining options.This is newly opened property is just a 15-minute walk to the popular Jonker Street and a 10-minute drive to Mahkota Parade Shopping Centre.Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a satellite flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom will include hot/cold shower facilities and a hairdryer. Ironing facilities are available upon request.Hotel Sentral’s 24-hour front desk will be happy to assist guests with luggage storage as well as meeting banquet facilities. Free private parking facilities are also available.Guests can unwind at the in-house restaurant which will serve local and international cuisines or opt for the café stocked with snacks and pastries.

address: 88 Jalan Kota Laksamana, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: Casa del Rio, Melaka, part of The Boutique Collection by HPL Hotels & Resorts, is located on Jalan Kota Laksamana, Melaka, a literal 2 minute walk away from the popular Jonkers Walk and heritage attractions. Keen observers will pick out the Arabic, Chinese and Dutch influences woven into the dominantly Mediterranean architecture. This boutique hotel, offering first class services, is already a striking addition to the historic skyline of the city. The hotel's 66 guest rooms and suites, each covering a minimum of 50 sq meters, uniquely feature dressing areas, bathrooms, split level bedrooms and private balconies as well as a number of unique personal touches. Aiming to provide an "at Home" atmosphere, Casa del Rio is a sanctuary from the city's bustle, with spaces for indulgent reflective solitude or stimulating interactive conversation depending on the choice of the traveller.

address: No. 18 Jalan Pm 6 Plaza Mahkota, Melaka Raya, Melaka 75000 Malaysia
description:
Venus Boutique Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Melaka, offering a boutique environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Rooms at Venus Boutique Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and blackout curtains providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and currency exchange are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. If you are driving to Venus Boutique Hotel, free parking is available.
Nearby landmarks such as Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.3 mi) and Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.6 mi) make Venus Boutique Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Melaka.
While in Melaka, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Venus Boutique Hotel, including Pak Putra Tandoori & Naan Restaurant (0.5 mi), Nyonya Makko Restaurant (0.5 mi), and Aunty Fatso Restaurant (肥嫂) (1.1 mi).
If you’re looking for something to do, Jonker Street (0.5 mi), Melaka Straits Mosque (0.7 mi), and Baba & Nyonya Heritage Museum (0.5 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Venus Boutique Hotel.
Enjoy your stay in Melaka!

description: Like millions of other travelers, you are drawn to ancient Malacca. A jewel set along aquamarine shores, Malacca has charmed many adventurers. Now, we unveil a new dimension to this grand city. We warmly welcome you to THE PINES MELAKA. It is a hotel where past meets present and fun meets funky to create an experience that can only be described as 'curiously charming'. The surprises never cease as nothing is ordinary and everything is extraordinary. At THE PINES MELAKA, the 'curiously charming'experience begins the moment you set foot in our lobbyand it extends to our rooms, our food and beverage outlets and the interaction with our staff. THE PINES MELAKA draws on Malacca's rich history and timeless traditions to delight you with a fusion of influences. Awaken your sense of wonder as you enter a world of comfort that has a nostalgic twist. Never has there been a creation quite like THE PINES MELAKA. And that is why the memories you make here will never quite leave you.....

description:
Hub of art & culture inspired by nature, kafe attached, located in the heart of the heritage.

The Baboon House is =

1. An art gallery to provide the opportunities for artistes to discuss and showcase their works and ideas without any kind of prejudices or discrimination.
2. A long term and sustainable restoration project in creating a deeper understanding and appreciation towards cultures and traditions.
3. A community hub for continuous learning of like-minded individuals to create a better dining and environmental conditions and not only for profit making purposes. (includes creating a shelter & awareness for abandoned furry animals on the street)
4. And a "home" as what it is initial built for 250 years ago......

The Concept of Baboon House is to provide the best dining experience to all our beloved customers in regard of the ambiance, art, food or services. Every Customers do play a big part in helping us to create a peaceful and tranquil experience during your visit. Thank you for your never ending support.

The Baboons.
For Love, Peace & Harmony

The bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, private toilet and deluxe bathroom amenities. Our spacious suites boast a private bedroom, a separate living area, dining table and sofa. Some suites overlook the Straits of Melaka. Family-friendly facilities include a kids club, a fitness centre, outdoor infinity pool, sauna and steam rooms. For groups there is an option to connect up to four rooms with a shared private hallway. For an authentic dining experience, this hotel offers three distinctive outlets. Makan Kitchen offers daily buffets and live cooking stations serving Malaysian and international cuisine. Tosca Trattoria Italiana features indoor and al fresco dining with stunning views, and Axis Lounge boasts a relaxing environment ideal for drinks and light snacks. In-room dining is available 24 hours.

description: Swiss-Garden Hotel Malacca offers contemporary lifestyle accommodation overlooking the UNESCO World Heritage Site of historic Malacca. Guests can enjoy the best of both worlds with the hotel's deluxe facilities and those of the adjoining shopping complex as well as discovering the many attractions in this historic port city. Picturesquely located in a bend of the meandering Malacca River guests can travel to and from the historic centre in the comfort of a covered boat along the river. The property is strategically located in one of Malacca's most historic districts and yet is just a 15 minutes walk from vibrant Jonker Street and other tourist sites. The 32 storeys towers comprise 306 elegant hotel rooms.

address: No 1 A, Jalan Melaka Raya 2, Melaka 75000 Malaysia
description: Novotel Melaka is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its trendy environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Novotel Melaka makes it easy to enjoy the best of Melaka. Novotel Melaka offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers room service and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and an on-site restaurant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. Close to some of Melaka's most popular landmarks, such as Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.4 mi) and Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.8 mi), Novotel Melaka is a great destination for tourists. Melaka has plenty of steakhouses. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Pampas Sky Dining Steakhouse, Millers Kitchen Restaurant, and The Windmill Station, which are serving up some great dishes. Should time allow, Jonker Street, Melaka Straits Mosque, and Baba & Nyonya Heritage Museum are some popular attractions that are within walking distance. Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Novotel Melaka is sure to make your visit to Melaka one worth remembering.

address: 32 Jalan Tukang Besi, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: The name of Kaya-kaya Cafe comes from a local spread known as “kaya”. It is generally rich in flavor and thick in texture. As such, our menu is created using the two keywords – richness and thickness. Our key vision is to promote more local specialties to foreigners. We elaborately design our fusion menu using our own local ingredients, such as salted egg chicken and sambal prawn, to serve with pasta. We serve food with kaya as well. Unlike the usual kaya that can be found everywhere, our kaya is especially homemade with duck eggs and Malacca sugar. One of the signature dishes that are served with kaya is “Malacca Elvis”; a pancake stack with sliced banana and kaya sandwiched in between, drizzled with homemade chocolate and peanut butter sauce. We also serve traditional dishes like “Yin Yong Toast” with kaya and butter and “Kaya Cheese Toast”.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: Kaya Kaya Cafe

description: “Kechik tapak tangan, nyeru saya tadahkan!” You are welcomed with open arms. Come explore the charms of the good old days and write your memories for tomorrow in the beautiful UNESCO Historic City of Melaka. More than just a hotel, this is Baba House. We feature traditional Peranakan & Oasis designed chambers, authentic Nyonya cuisine proudly served at Mari Chiak Restaurant (Let’s Eat), and facilities which include the Kaki Minom (Drinking Friends) rooftop bar, Bilek Bacha Library (Reading Room), Banquet Hall, and Function Rooms. Within the neighbourhood of Baba House, you are a few doors away from the Melaka must-go-to famous spots namely Jonker Walk Street, the 17th-century Stadthuys building, Melaka River Park and Cruise, Baba and Nyonya Heritage Museums, and Cheng Hoon Teng Temple .

Located at the very heart of UNESCO World Heritage City Melaka, it’s away from the hustle and bustle of city traffic. Set within leisure walk, it is 1km from Melaka Histrorical sites and 1.6km walk from Jonker Street and Stadthuys. Within the property, free of charge open parking lots on ground floor with CCTV and around the clock Security Personnel on watch. 24hours Front Desk service. Level 1, features Bica & Co Cafe which offers favorite western, fusion and local dishes. Also, house brand merchandises are available for sale at RS General Store in the lobby area. Various bedroom categories are located from level 2 to level 6, are well equipped from fixtures to amenities and facilities. Gym is on Level 7 for those who loves to sweat it out. Inbound/outbound Melaka Sentral Bus Terminal is located 6.2km away while Melaka International Airport Batu Berendam is 10.1km away.

description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Melaka does not have to be difficult. Welcome to The Explorer Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
While staying at The Explorer Hotel, visitors can check out Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.1 mi) and Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.6 mi), some of Melaka's top attractions.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
If you are driving to The Explorer Hotel, free parking is available.
While visiting Melaka, you may want to try some fish and chips at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Geographer Cafe, Bistro Year 1673, or Simply fish.
If you are interested in exploring Melaka, check out a military museum, such as Muzium TLDM.
The Explorer Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Melaka.

address: 12-39, Jalan KLJ 1, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly boutique hotel in Melaka does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Trevor Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.8 mi) and Encore Melaka (1.4 mi), guests of Trevor Hotel can easily experience some of Melaka's most well known attractions.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the boutique hotel.
Trevor Hotel features a 24 hour front desk and outdoor furniture, to help make your stay more enjoyable. If you are driving to Trevor Hotel, free parking is available.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Melaka's popular crab restaurants such as Aunty Fatso Restaurant (肥嫂), Restoran Tong Sheng, and Teo Soon Loong Seafood Restaurant, all a short distance from Trevor Hotel.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jonker Street (0.5 mi), Baba & Nyonya Heritage Museum (0.6 mi), or Stadthuys (0.7 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Trevor Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Melaka.

name: Trevor Hotel by I Housing

roomTips/1/text: Avoid rooms that near front desk.

address: 1 Jalan KSB 1, Taman Kota Syahbandar Taman Kota Syahbandar, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: Tucked away in a quiet pocket of the UNESCO world heritage of Malacca, the 3-star Swan Garden Hotel Melaka is an elegant boutique hotel that combines the distinct cultural styles of British India, Traditional Malay, Baba Nyonya and Balinese into a little paradise. It is strategically located in the perfect place from where guests can explore the city conveniently. 6 mins to the famous Jonker Street by car. Discover first-hand the cultures that lived side-by-side at the height of the Malaccan trading empire. Immerse yourself in the eclectic style of the British India rajas, the natural styles of the Malay, the Chinese-Malay sensibilities of the Baba Nyonya, and the richness of the Balinese. Be it business or pleasure, Swan Garden Hotel Melaka promises to deliver a truly unforgettable experience.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State

roomTips/1/text: Higher floors for city or seaview.

roomTips/3/text: Book online, walk in rate is higher than onlinecrate
roomTips/4/text: Try to ask the room that faces the sea.

address: Jalan Kee Ann, Melaka 75100 Malaysia
description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly hotel in Melaka does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Prima Hotel Melaka, a nice option for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Prima Hotel Melaka features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a fitness center. If you are driving to Prima Hotel Melaka, free parking is available.
Close to some of Melaka's most popular landmarks, such as Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.2 mi) and Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.5 mi), Prima Hotel Melaka is a great destination for tourists.
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the diners, including Durian Dreamland, Pink Tomyam Restaurant, and Kafe Mary Take 1, all of which are a short distance from Prima Hotel Melaka.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Jonker Street (0.3 mi), Melaka Straits Mosque (0.9 mi), and Baba & Nyonya Heritage Museum (0.3 mi), which are some popular Melaka attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
Prima Hotel Melaka puts the best of Melaka at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: Prima Hotel Melaka
roomTips/0/text: Try to get a room with balcony. Less stuffy.
roomTips/1/text: Skip the breakfast, Explore outside. PLaces like Baba Kaya , Sin See Tai are great cafes.
roomTips/2/text: Ask for window room which overlooks the front road
roomTips/3/text: Avoid rooms in the middle as windows facing inner part of hotel
roomTips/4/text: Choose a room on the south side, over looking the fruit stalls which are open before dawn till late!

address: 107 Jalan Banda Kaba Bandar Hilir, Melaka 75000 Malaysia
description: Welcome to Rucksack Inn Premium (Melaka, Malaysia), a proud member of Southeast Asia's leading hostel chain—Rucksack Inn. With branches in Bali, Phuket, Singapore, Siargao, Manila, Vietnam, and more, we bring our renowned hospitality and expertise to the World Heritage Town of Melaka! A stay at Rucksack Inn Premium places you in the heart of Malacca City, within a 5-minute walk of the Kite Museum and Bukit China. This hotel is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Jonker Street Night Market and 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from Mahkota Parade Shopping Mall.

description: An award winning Hotel . Sojourn Guest House Melaka was awarded best Hotel in Malaysia for the year 2016/17. A luxury, romantic and trendy boutique hotel built on the premise of tracing Melaka roots and influences. address: Jalan MITC, Prima 1 Hang Tuah Jaya, Melaka 75450 Malaysia
description: Located in the serene Ayer Keroh, Hotel Kobemas offers free WiFi, air-conditioning and on-site restaurant. Rooms at this hotel come with a flat-screen satellite TV and en suite bathroom with free toiletries and bidet. Some rooms also come with a seating area. At Hotel Kobemas you will find a 24-hour front desk. Activities on-site include bowling, which is offered at a surcharge. The hotel offers car hire and free parking. The area is popular for golfing. The historic town of Melaka is located 10 km from the hotel, while Pasir Panjang is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Kuala Lumpur International Airport, which is 84 km from the hotel.

Step into our cozy atmosphere and explore a delightful selection of light foods, including savory baos, freshly made sandwiches, and delectable desserts. Indulge your senses with our artisanal coffee and refreshing drinks, expertly crafted to perfection. From aromatic espressos to creamy lattes, each sip is designed to elevate your café experience. But Hygge is more than just a dining destination; it's a celebration of local artistry and craftsmanship. Immerse yourself in our curated collection of local art work, handmade crochet items, and hand-poured candles. Each piece embodies the spirit of our community, adding a unique touch to your visit. Join us at Hygge, where every moment is infused with comfort, creativity, and community. We can't wait to welcome you!

address: No. 32 Jalan Mutiara Melaka Taman Mutiara Melaka, Melaka 75350 Malaysia
description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Melaka does not have to be difficult. Welcome to 906 Premier Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
Close to some of Melaka's most popular landmarks, such as The Huskitory (2.6 mi) and St. Peter's Church (2.6 mi), 906 Premier Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a desk, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
906 Premier Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to 906 Premier Hotel, free parking is available.
While in Melaka be sure to experience local crab favorites at Restoran Lee, Lu Yeh Yen, or Handsome Seafood Restaurant.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out an ancient ruins, such as St. Paul's Hill & Church (Bukit St. Paul).
906 Premier Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Melaka.

locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: 906 Premier Hotel

address: 27, 29 & 31, Jalan Bunga Raya, Melaka 75100 Malaysia
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly small hotel in Melaka, look no further than 1825 Gallery Hotel.
While staying at 1825 Gallery Hotel, visitors can check out Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.3 mi) and Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.4 mi), some of Melaka's top attractions.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a seating area, and you can stay connected during your stay as 1825 Gallery Hotel offers guests free wifi.
The small hotel features a 24 hour front desk. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
If you’re looking for a cafe, consider a visit to Geographer Cafe, The Baboon House, or Calanthe Art Cafe, which are all conveniently located a short distance from 1825 Gallery Hotel.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular military museums such as Muzium TLDM.
The staff at 1825 Gallery Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: 1825 Gallery Hotel

roomTips/2/text: Good location. Lacks basic facilities. Consider other boutique options as Malacca is not that big, so walking is easy.
roomTips/3/text: Not a resort. Nothing for kids. Print off your own map. Upload the Google Translate App.

address: 1 Jalan Melaka Raya 9 Taman Melaka Raya, Melaka 75000 Malaysia
description: Eco Tree Hotel is a 3 star contemporary hotel strategically located in the heart of Melaka Raya business district and within minutes' walk to many historical sites, shopping centres, food & beverage outlets, hotels, restaurants, private medical centre, numerous entertainment outlets and Spa & Health Centres. This 120 room hotel features six types of room category ranging from Superior, Executive Deluxe, Executive Suites, Premier Suites, Studio Suites to Family Suites. The Hotel is complimented with a designer's Coffee House, three (3) meeting rooms, a 25 meter length 4 feet deep pool currently acknowledged as the highest swimming pool ever been located and a well-equipped Gymnasium on the level 8 for you to workout. We also cater for tour group meal such as High Tea, Skyview Lunch & Sunset Dinner which is serve at our Sky Deck 360 VIP Executive Lounge with complimentary usage of the karaoke facilities. On the highest point of the Hotel, we also proudly present a 360 degree Sky Deck and Pool Bar with a panoramic view of the city skyline and the famous Straits of Melaka where our guests can relax and enjoy the sunrise or sunset. At the Pool Bar you can have a cuppa or simply chill-out in the evening with a glass of wine, cold beer and snacks. We also cater for exclusive private functions, Wedding, Annual Dinner and others events at our Sky Deck and Pool Bar.

address: 9 km Jalan Tanjung Kling, Melaka 76400 Malaysia
description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Melaka, Shah's Beach Resort is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its proximity to great restaurants, Shah's Beach Resort makes it easy to enjoy the best of Melaka. Rooms at Shah`s Beach Hotel provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free internet access. In addition, while staying at Shah`s Beach Resort guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and 24 hour security. You can also enjoy a pool and breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Shah`s Beach Hotel. If you are looking for some good spots to eat nearby, you may want to check out Bert's Garden Seafood (0.9 mi), Nyonya Delight - Homestyle Nyonya Food (1.0 mi), or Nasi Lemak Esso (0.1 mi), all of which are within walking distance of Shah's Beach Resort. Looking to explore? Then look no further than No 8 Heeren Street Heritage Centre, A Famosa Fort, and Chetti Village, which are some popular Melaka historic sites – all conveniently located a short distance from the resort. Shah's Beach Resort is sure to make your visit to Melaka one worth remembering.

address: Jalan Parameswara Banda Hilir, Melaka 75000 Malaysia
description: Located on Level 3, the Seri Nyonya Peranakan Restaurant is designed to replicate an authentic Peranakan family home, giving guests an idea of Dutch, Portuguese, Malay and Colonial influences that make a Straits-born or Peranakan home unique. At Seri Nyonya Peranakan Restaurant, guests are welcomed by intricate traditional wood carvings, finely detailed porcelain wall tiles, as well as traditional Peranakan paintings and artifacts. Seri Nyonya Peranakan Restaurant is renowned for its authentic home-cooked meals. Amongst some of the classic nyonya favorites are Hee Peow Soup, Ayam Pongteh, Udang Lemak Nenas, Ikan Chilli Garam, Nyonya Chap Chai, Omelette with Cincaluk and Otak-Otak. Conclude the meal with delicious, mouth-watering desserts such as Cendol Gula Melaka, Ais Batu Campur or an assortment of traditional Nyonya Kuih's.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: Seri Nyonya Restaurant

address: No. 50 Jalan Kampung Hulu, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description:
Welcome to 906 Riverside Hotel, your Melaka “home away from home.” 906 Riverside Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Melaka, 906 Riverside Hotel is located a short distance from Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.1 mi) and Kampung Morten (0.3 mi).
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and 24 hour security while staying at 906 Riverside Hotel. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Chinese restaurants, including Aunty Fatso Restaurant (肥嫂), Nancy's Kitchen Restaurant, and Jonker 88, all of which are a short distance from 906 Riverside Hotel.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jonker Street (0.2 mi), Melaka Straits Mosque (1.0 mi), or Baba & Nyonya Heritage Museum (0.3 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
906 Riverside Hotel puts the best of Melaka at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

description: Savoury fast-casual style modern Italian-Asian fusion pasta. Chef Pasta is a fast-casual style modern Italian-Asian fusion pasta stand that opened in hawker center called Jonker Street Kopitiam at Melaka, Malaysia in 19-June-2023. It offers a unique dining experience with its innovative dishes that combine traditional Italian and modern Asian flavors in one plate through his special culinary techniques and using artisan product and premium ingredient. Food is a resonance and sharing between people, no matter how far the distances, it can't stop the smile caused by food and the joy of the moment, laughter is brightest in the place where the food is food. Chef Pasta is committed to create premium quality cuisines and spreads the excellence gourmet culturel, we hope to share the best with everyone, everywhere in the future.

description: Nestled along Melaka's picturesque coast, Straits Mansion offers an unparalleled dining experience by the sea. Just 15 minutes from the historic Jonker Street, it stands as the last unreclaimed beach by the Straits of Malacca, boasting British-built historical buildings dating back to 1890. The restaurant features beach bars serving Mediterranean fusion cuisine and cocktails, with lively weekend parties. Guests can unwind to the soothing sound of waves while enjoying refreshing drinks. With its idyllic waterfront location, Straits Mansion promises an unforgettable dining experience amidst panoramic views of the straits, perfect for romantic dinners or gatherings with loved ones.

address: 5 Jalan Tun Tan Cheng Lock, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: 5 Heeren is a Peranakan Museum Residence located on Jalan Tun Tan Cheng Lock, Melaka, one of Melaka's finest and most intact heritage streets which is in the very heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Site. It has recently opened its doors in December 2016 after seven years of refurbishment, and the fine work of conservation and restoration will be evident once you step into 5 Heeren. 5 Heeren is a literal 1 minute walk away from the popular Jonker Street, and just a few minutes walk from all the major icons such as The Stadhuys, Malacca River, The Peranakan Museum, etc. This Peranakan Museum Residence (adults only) has 10 guest suites, and uniquely features dressing areas, bathrooms, and private balconies (our river facing suites) as well as a number of personal touches. Aiming to provide a 'home away from home' atmosphere, 5 Heeren is your haven from the city's bustle, and it uniquely captures & celebrates the spirit of this UNESCO World Heritage City and its unique Peranakan culture.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: 5 Heeren Museum Residence
roomTips/0/text: I came in early May which is before the busy season which was very nice.

roomTips/2/text: Book direct and call ahead if you need car parking.
roomTips/3/text: Car park is at the back of the hotel facing the Melaka River.
roomTips/4/text: I suggest a sleep mask.  There is outside lighting.

description: Situated in Melaka, 700 metres from The Stadthuys, CHRISTEE SUITES HOTEL features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Cheng Hoon Teng Temple, St John's Fort and Porta de Santiago. The accommodation provides an indoor pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. Rooms come with a private bathroom, a shower and bathrobes, and some rooms at CHRISTEE SUITES HOTEL have a safety deposit box. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.

address: 170 Jalan Parameswara, Melaka 75000 Malaysia
description:
See why so many travelers make Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka their hotel of choice when visiting Melaka. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Rooms at Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka provide a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
In addition, Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka offers a pool and free breakfast, which will help make your Melaka trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.9 mi) and Woof Station (1.8 mi), guests of Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka can easily experience some of Melaka's most well known attractions.
If you’re looking for a diner, consider a visit to Durian Dreamland, Pink Tomyam Restaurant, or Kafe Mary Take 1, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka.
Melaka is also known for some great architectural buildings, including Stadthuys and Malacca Sultanate Palace, which are not too far from Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka as you experience all of the things Melaka has to offer.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: Hallmark Crown Hotel - Melaka

description: Managed by Alorie Hospitality, Hotel MetraSquare Melaka is a mid-scale hotel – ideal for company and family gatherings, getaways, seminars and retreats – nearby the myriad attractions of the state and the UNESCO Heritage City of Melaka (Malacca). A great setting for budget conscious travellers, many of its very spacious rooms can accommodate up to 4 persons. Recently upgraded and renovated, the premium 3-star hotel offers 400 rooms and 10 meeting rooms with access to a state of the art 800 pax Ballroom and luxury function facilities at the attached 5-star 302 room sister property – The Ames Hotel. Minutes from the Ayer Keroh toll off the North-South Expressway of Peninsular Malaysia, it is also nearby the Melaka International Trade Centre, government offices, Mydin hypermart and a host of Melaka state’s activities and attractions.

address: 10km Jalan Tanjung Kling, Melaka 76400 Malaysia
description:
Welcome to Everly Resort, your Melaka “home away from home.” Everly Resort aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Everly Resort offers guests free wifi.
The hotel features room service. Plus, Everly Resort offers a pool and an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
Travelers looking to enjoy some crab can head to Bert's Garden Seafood or The Seafarer.
Melaka is also known for some great architectural buildings, including Stadthuys and Malacca Sultanate Palace, which are not too far from Everly Resort.
Everly Resort puts the best of Melaka at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

description: Swiss Hotel Boutique Heritage Melaka is suitably located in the famous Jonker Walk Melaka. It is located in the heart of city which is just walking distance to many tourist destinations. Surrounding Swiss Hotel Heritage Melaka are the many popular tourist attractions – Jonker night market (just behind), Stadthuys, Hardrock Cafe, Melaka Stamp World Museum, Kota A-Famosa, Medan Samundera, MBMB swimming pool, Melaka River Cruise, Flor De La Mar, Maritime Museum, Melaka Duck Tour, Proclamatian of Independence Memorial, Datatran Pahlawan Melaka Megamall and Mahkota Parade Megamall. Our patron will get to enjoy the “unique heritage concept.” This is among offers the first of its kind in Melaka. Swiss Hotel Heritage Boutique Melaka offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. Top features of the hotel include family room, luggage storage, Wi-Fi, smoking area, and 24-hour front desk. Swiss Hotel Heritage Boutique Melaka is only hotel that provides you the special buffet breakfast with local assorted kuih muih, or snack in English, and local cuisine from Melaka that you cannot find in other hotels or restaurants. All guest accommodations feature thoughtful amenities to ensure an unparalleled sense of comfort. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or are just looking for a way to unwind after a hard day, you will be entertained by top-class recreational facilities such as sauna, massage. Swiss Hotel Heritage Boutique Melaka is your one-stop destination.

address: 155 Jalan Tun Tan near Jonker Walk, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: Heeren Palm Suites is a beautifully restored Heritage Hotel in the heart of Melaka's UNESCO World Heritage site, near Jonker Walk & the Malacca River. Combining both old world charm with contemporary comforts such as large rooms, Italian marble ensuite bathrooms with rain showers & sumptuous hotel amenities, luxurious pillow top beds & bedlinen, Heeren Palm Suites is the perfect place to come home to after a day of indulging in cultural, historical & gastronomical experiences in Malacca. The Hotel is strategically located centrally, enabling hotel guests to conveniently explore historical & cultural Melaka just minutes from its doorstep. The delights of Jonker Walk & the secrets of the Baba Nonya Heritage Museum, A'Famosa Fort, Christ Church, Stadhuys, Dutch (Red) Square, Cheng Ho Cultural Museum, Cheng Hoon Teng Temple, Straits Chinese Jewellery Museum, the Malacca River, Malacca Heritage Centre, St Paul's Hill & more, are within walking distance of the Heeren Palm Suites Hotel.

address: 26, Jalan Tukang Besi, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: Layang Layang Guest House is located at Blacksmith Street, which is known today as Jalan Tukang Besi. It is only one-minute walk to Jonker Street (Jonker Walk), and is the best location during your exploration in one of the oldest heritage sites in Malaysia that is preserved till today. The building of the guesthouse is believed to be over 100 years old. Back in the olden days, it used to be a famous opium den, and was once a brothel too! As you stay in the wooden house with history, it often feels like travelling back in time. Its original structure remains, including the large beautiful courtyard that represents the “feng shui” of the house. Fully restored since 2013, the guesthouse offers a fusion of old world charm and modern convenience. Today, it has a total of 20 fully air-conditioned rooms and 8 shared bathrooms that are cleaned and well-maintained at all times and equipped with quality toilet amenities. Combined with modern and heritage design, we assure our guests staying with pleasure and views of the heritage street. Carefully selected room furniture, cozy lobby, and the secret garden create a clean, soothing, and comfortable environment for your breakaway relaxation experience.

The Hotel's elegant rooms feature beautiful en-suite Italian marble bathrooms with sensuous rain showers and luxury amenities. Each room is designed in contemporary boutique hotel style. You lay your head on plush down pillows, sleep on sumptuous pillow top beds dressed in luxurious bed linen, use waffle yukata bathrobes, watch large flat screen TVs, surf the internet with complimentary wi-fi connectivity & enjoy a turn down service in the evening.

A house with car porch located in the heart of the historical city Melaka, that is within walking distance to the UNESCO Historical Site, main business, shopping and entertainment districts by walking distance as below: Jonker Walk - 1 minHereen Street (Art Galleries, Fashion Boutiques, Baba Nyonya Museum, Bird Nest Museum, Conservation Museum) - between 30 seconds - 5 mins Malacca Stadthuys, Clock Tower, Christ Church, St Francis Church - 3 minsShopping Complex (Dataran Pahlawan, Mahkota Parade) - 10 minsOur loft with a build up of 130 square meters, fully furnished, self contained, self-service comfort and privacy. It is come with approx. 35 square meters Living with Dining room, setup with a old fashion cushion chair and 8 seaters dining set table. A 9 square meters AV room with a 39in LED Flat Screen TV, Home Theater System and Bluray Player, provide you the comfortably bean bag chairs for your leisure holidays with your treasure movie or music. We also have only bathroom with WC at ground floor, attached with hand and rain shower water heater. A useful kitchen by the indoor garden. Full facilities such like Electrical Cooker, Slow Cooker, Oven, Microwave, Dining ware etc. We also provide home basic cooking ingredients for your convenience to prepare your private meal as your wish. BBQ or Steamboat equipments will provide upon request too. One mezzanine bedroom approx. 35 square meters comfortably for 4 persons. It is a pair of King Size Bed with a branded Destress Mattress for you release your stresses and have a sweet dream in this Artisan Loft. If your plan is more than 4 persons, we will set up the extra DESTRESS MATTRESS at the AV room for make sure everyone have comfortable environment and setting for leisure. Looking forward to serve you and share with you our love and - culture of this heritage city - MALACCA

description: OYO 1090 Hollitel Hotel Melaka is located in the business district of Malacca. This property is within easy reach of Taming Sari Tower, A Famosa and Klebang Beach, which are a few of the top tourist destinations in the city visited by tourists. Special Features- Hollitel Hotel takes a minimalistic approach, where simpler furnishings and pale white walls make the room brighter. The rooms are spacious and well-maintained, ensuring maximum comfort to the guests during the stay. CCTV surveillance is also an additional feature provided so guests don't have to worry about security. Facilities- Nights at this hotel will be spent in air-conditioned rooms accompanied by TV and Wi-Fi so guests can stay connected with friends and family. The rooms are prepared with either a single, queen or king bed depending on whichever category is chosen by the guests. Nearby- Other than historical sites, Malacca is also known for its mouth-watering food scene, making it a popular attraction among tourists. Some of these signature dishes can be tasted at Asam Pedas Claypot. Other local delicacies can be tried at places like Pak Putra or Jonker Street Night Market, located not too far from Hollitel Hotel's doorstep.

description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Melaka, Fantasy Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Fantasy Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Melaka.
Rooms at Fantasy Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a desk providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this small hotel. A fitness center and a snack bar will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Fantasy Hotel, parking is available.
Nearby landmarks such as Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.3 mi) and Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.6 mi) make Fantasy Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Melaka.
While visiting Melaka, you may want to try some dim sum at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Low Yong Moh Restaurant, Dim Sum Garden Restaurant, or Rong Mao Tea Restaurant.
Best of all, Fantasy Hotel makes it easy to experience many great Melaka attractions like Time Machine Gallery, The Discovery Of The Body, and Muzium Kecantikan, which are some popular art museums.
Fantasy Hotel is sure to make your visit to Melaka one worth remembering.

address: 3 Jalan Kampung Kuli, Melaka 75200 Malaysia
description: Fully restored since July 2015, Mori Residence is a boutique guesthouse combined with tea house hidden on a quiet street of the UNESCO World Heritage City of Malacca, namely Jalan Kampung Kuli. The many residents living along the street today are of sentimental value, constituting a very interesting neighborhood. “Mori” refers to the woods in Japanese, also translated as forest. The dominant element in the boutique guesthouse and tea house is wood to match its modern and heritage design. It has a total of five fully air-conditioned rooms, one of which has an attic as its distinctive feature. Each room comes with a private bathroom. The tea house on the ground floor is perfect for chilling over a cuppa in a comfortable environment. Our guests are also entitled for a session of free tea ceremony (during specific days and times only). The boutique guesthouse and tea house is only two-minute walk to Jonker Street (night market). It is located in close proximity to the major tourist attractions and famous eateries in Malacca, making it an ideal place for your family and friends to fully experience what the heritage city has to offer. FACILITIES • Air-conditioned room • Private bathroom with hot and cold shower • Complimentary in-room WiFi • Hairdryer upon request • Towels • Coffee, tea, biscuits, and alkaline water all day long (self-service) at shared pantry • Refrigerator and basic dishware at shared pantry • Cozy and spacious common area with sofas, rattan chairs and beanbags for relaxation • Garden with water features • Washing machine (surcharge apply, at Layang Layang Guest House) • Bicycles for rent (at Layang Layang Guest House) • Strategic location; 2-minute walk to Hard Rock Cafe and Jonker Street • We can help you to purchase ticket(s) and/or book taxi(s) for your next destination (prices and conditions depend on our agent)

address: 39 Lorong 2, Jalan Haji Pitchay Jalan Ujong Pasir, Melaka 75050 Malaysia
description: DRIFTWOOD GUEST HOUSE The Driftwood guest house is located in a quiet residential area of Melaka between the historic Portuguese Settlement, where you can experience the life style of the descendants of the Portuguese settlers, and the lively Melaka Raya with its shopping, restaurants and night life. We are in easy walking distance of local shops, food courts, restaurants and fruit stalls. There is a supermarket, a 24 hour Seven Eleven with an ATM nearby and there are taxis and bus services. A ten minutes walk will take you to the centre of Melaka Raya and a further ten minutes walk will take you to Jonker Street, the centre of historical World Heritage Melaka. FACILITIES All our rooms have local TV, mini bar, hair drier, air conditioning, ceiling fan, access to balcony and private bathroom with shower gel, shampoo and other bathroom amenities. Tea and coffee is provided and we have an iron and ironing board for your use. We have free Wi-Fi and CCTV security surveillance and free parking. A baby cot is available. Upon check-in you will be given house keys so you can come and go as you please. We will assist you in any way we can to enjoy local activities, swimming, cycling, food experiences and the local culture of Melaka during your stay with us. We speak English, Malay and Cantonese. RATES (Nett) Room only per night Sunday to Thursday Japanese Room 2 Persons RM 130 Caribbean Room 2 Persons RM 150 Suite 5 Persons RM 312 Deluxe Room 2 Persons RM 150 Friday, Saturday, School and Public Holiday, Eve of Public Holiday Japanese Room 2 Persons RM 150 Caribbean Room 2 Persons RM 166 Suite 5 Persons RM 336 Deluxe Room 2 Persons RM 166 Extra bed RM 60 Breakfast is available for RM 15 per person. The Driftwood Suite and our double rooms are available on a monthly basis. Rates are available on request. Dinner can be provided on request

description:
Looking for a place to stay in Melaka? Then look no further than The Kahaani Malacca Hotel, a charming inn that brings the best of Melaka to your doorstep.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at The Kahaani Malacca Hotel offer air conditioning.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including room service, a concierge, and baggage storage. Guests of The Kahaani Malacca Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and barbeque facilities, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
Given the close proximity to Mini Malaysia & ASEAN Cultural Park Melaka (1.3 mi), guests of The Kahaani Malacca Hotel can easily experience one of Melaka's most popular landmarks.
If you’re looking for a Mediterranean restaurant, consider a visit to Dima Restaurant, which is not far from The Kahaani Malacca Hotel.
Melaka is also known for some great art galleries, including The Orangutan House, Tham Siew Inn Artist Gallery, and Hueman Studio, which are not too far from The Kahaani Malacca Hotel.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Kahaani Malacca Hotel as you experience everything Melaka has to offer.

address: 7 Jalan Bukit Cina, Melaka 75100 Malaysia
description: TROKA is an abstract sanctuary in the hub of Malacca’s historical precinct. It was built in 1914 and is one of the preserved buildings which is located in the old town center (a street filled with classic colonial residences). Just about a stone's throw away to Little India Street, Malacca River and only 4 minutes walking distance to the historical area such as Stadhuys, A'Famosa, St. Paul's Hill, China Town, and hustle bustle of the famous Jonker Street and many other famous museums. Troka boast 7 guestrooms including dorms, with shared bathrooms. Whenever you need time to chill out, unwind yourself at our Cafe for some light snacks. Original wooden beams on the ceiling, richly-textured lobby hall of rough exposed bricks, fusion of old antique wall, courtyard, and reclaimed wooden floor inviting you to experience the modern to the local influence of Peranakan heritage era. TROKA is inspired mixture of tropical nature, old-world charm with distinctly style and energy. TROKA describes itself as the next generation of cheap chic.
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: Troka Prewar Residence
roomTips/0/text: choose room at the back of the hotel

roomTips/2/text: choose the TK 7 because the view is nice.
roomTips/3/text: If you want a private room, there are 2 - one has windows and the other doesn't! The one that has windows is the street facing side. The curtains aren't light-proof so just get an early night's sleep.
roomTips/4/text: Request for "Abang Long" a.k.a Kuzman. He will take you to the good restaurant and nice places.

The property surrounded by many local nice foods and 7-11. *Good for big groups: 3 connecting houses of 5 rooms each and one 3 rooms house. localAddress: 25A Jalan Kota Laksamana 1/2, 25A Kota Laksamana 1/2 Road/Street, 75200
locationString: Melaka, Central Melaka District, Melaka State
name: Jonkerdee Hostel
roomTips/0/text:
The dormitories are separated by curtains and though there are no notices or signs reminding 'in-house guests' to maintain silence or speak in soft tones at appropriate hours, many of the occupants of the dormitories seem to have it ingrained in their minds to keep their voices low particularly after 10.00 pm and  before 10.00am. This we found rather amazing!
The Bedrooms or the Dorms both make for a good stay.
roomTips/1/text:
We took two rooms, the lovely double bedroom that resembles a hanging garden, beautifully decorated with God's creatures of the land, water and air, along with some fascinating ornaments, antiques and paintings on display, all tastefully done. The other room with 3 single beds was perfect and told stories and showed photographs of Andre's heritage and family. These rooms suited us fine for a family of five. Both rooms were side by side and along the pathway to the hall.
We'd just like to add that the dormitories we're impressive and like the rooms were worthy of value and price.
roomTips/2/text: Go for the Malacca Kampung style Dormitory. It can accommodate 4 persons and is spacious and original in its theme, decoration and atmosphere. There are interesting collectibles on display and you can unwind and relax by putting on the "sarong" if you want to experience true Kampung style "dress" comfort while sitting on a mat on the floor, sipping tea and having some local delicacies. Quite an experience, we'd say!!!. The dorm is midway between the Hall and Kitchen, on the right.
roomTips/3/text: The Raja Parameswara Chamber held my attention as it's a dormitory with two single beds. I thought it was "cool" as it was "different" and 'held some local folklore tradition". It is one of the most fore front dorms in the hostel.
roomTips/4/text: We would have been happy to settle in one of the dormitory, especially the one that has all the imagination of being in Egypt like being in Cleopatra's Chambers. Perhaps next time. That's the one I'd like to recommend! It is the second last room from where the kitchen is.

description: Welcome to l'Armada guesthouse….We are conveniently located; for starters your trip from Melaka Sentral will take about 15 minutes (see map and direction). We are a new guesthouse in Chinatown. Just a 4 minute walk will bring you to the heart of it all. We will help you explore wonderful cuisines at great prices. As you walk through the city the architecture and history blend together in such a unique enjoyable way. After a full day of sightseeing and picture taking you will look forward to our serene and quiet place on the Malacca river. Features:- Massive 14m x 6m (52ft x19 ft) common area allows multiple activities with space- Free internet without time limit- Free wifi- Smoke free inside, smoking on "balconies" and on roof- Bicycles for rent- Usual guesthouse freebies and facilities. WE ACCEPT GROUP BOOKING (MAX 37 PEOPLE). Additional Information: COMFORTABLE, ALWAYS CLEAN AND CHEAP. We provide :- 12 beds in Dormitory (carpeted) with windows- 6 rooms for Twin (with/without windows) laminate flooring- 9 rooms for Double (with/without windows) laminate flooring- 4 common bathrooms tile with shower- spacious common area (carpeted), airy with river view- free internet service and Wi Fi- make yourself at home, free coffee/tea, hot/cold drinking water- smoke free; smokers don't worry....u can smoke at the balcony with wonderful riverview- Friendly atmosphere; we like people- we provide laundry services.

description:
Welcome to AJIT GUESTHOUSE & HOTEL, a place where you can relax and stay comfortably.Also a place where you can learn the way of Japanese traditional style sitting on TATAMI MATs Living Room.What is most notable is our The largest and beautiful living room with Tatami MATs is originally imported from Japan and Tatami platform room frame in dark walnut.The low platform Room frame is made of 100% solid OAK hardwood(parawood-environ mentally friendly wood) in satin finish.

We're located in the heart of melaka(Malacca),city of UNESCO historical site.We are just minutes away from all tourist spot such as the Menara Taming sari (Melaka Tower),The Jonker Walk (China Town ),Fort A 'Famosa,St.Paul's Church,The Dutch Square (Stadhuys) and even all the famous museum.Ideally  located in the heart  of historical area,Business centre shopping mall, Entertainment spot,night market and etc.

We offer special quality accommodation with it superb clean budget rooms from single to triple with fan to an upmarket rooms with air-con, private bathroom and with TV. All rooms are built with brick wall and windows which are facing outside.

roomTips/0/text:
1) Rooms only comes with option for attached bathroom. Toilets are shared. 
2) Wifi reception not available on 2nd floor.
3) Only 2 power points in room. One for table lamp and the other free. Either bring extensions or don't use table lamp. (if you have attached bathroom, and need the room to be lighted at night, just leave the bathroom lights on)
4) Rooms with windows can be very bright as thin curtains won't block out sunlight. Either opt for rooms without windows if you like to sleep in, or bring sleep mask.
5) Noise proof level is next to zero. Even if you are not awaken by the sunlight in your eyes, you might be awaken by people talking or kids running along the corridor.
roomTips/1/text: Ask for room facing along the street which is not so bright. The hot sun shines through the other rooms and  the curtain are too thin to provide any shade.
roomTips/2/text:
Get a room (1) with a window and (2) with a bathroom.  You still will have to use the public WC. 
Go there only if you're traveling on strict budget, or if you're going to stay not more than 1 night.
roomTips/3/text: Don't worry about toilets being outside. What we need is the shower room inside always. Toilets are regularly cleaned.
roomTips/4/text: Two person a room is good enough. However if added extra bed would be a little crowded.

Walk down the original wooden staircase or the spiral staircase to Kaya-kaya Cafe on the ground floor the next morning to enjoy traditional local breakfast in a heritage building. description: OYO 840 Hotel Bamboo is located in the Melaka Town in Tengkara, very close to Jonker Street and Baba & Nyonya Heritage Museum. It is also close to places like Melaka Sentral, Plaza Hang Tuah and Cheng Hoon Teng Temple. Special Features- The rooms offer 3 beds in one area with ample space to move about. There is facility for night light in the room and the false ceiling has downlighters as well. The feature walls of the room are grey in colour. The bath area in the hotel room is really neat and clean with tiles on the walls. There is a living area with glass round tables and chairs to go with it. Facilities- The hotel offers AC, twin single bed, TV, single bed, free Wi-Fi and CCTV cameras to the guests. Nearby- While you're here, you can also go sightseeing at the Shore Oceanarium or explore the River Cruise Taman Rempah Jetty. Some of the restaurants nearby include Wan Hong Xiang Dim Sum Restaurant and Restoran Soon Fong.

Finding an ideal guest house in Melaka does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Heritage Guild, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Cheng Hoon Teng Temple (0.1 mi) and Malacca Sultanate Palace (0.4 mi), guests of Hotel Heritage Guild can easily experience some of Melaka's most well known attractions.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with wifi offered by the guest house.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Melaka's popular dim sum restaurants such as Low Yong Moh Restaurant, Dim Sum Garden Restaurant, and Rong Mao Tea Restaurant, all a short distance from Hotel Heritage Guild.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jonker Street (0.0 mi), Melaka Straits Mosque (0.9 mi), or Baba & Nyonya Heritage Museum (0.1 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Hotel Heritage Guild looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Melaka.
